name: Juby's Cafe
description:
A small little game designed for the Weekly Game Jam theme of "Tycoon".

You play as Juby, a small deer lady, and must cook and craft items to send off using your magical letterbox, and recieve coins in return! These can be used to buy more igredients for cooking, or furniture to make your house look prettier!

As this is a jam entry, the game is nowhere near perfect. I definitely plan on updating the game post-jam with new content and just more things to do in general, however!
